title: Justice for rural women: An exploratory analysis of institutions and mechanisms to access justice in Chimborazo, Ecuador
content:
Publication date: 30 March 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 6

Author(s): Julio A. Alvarado-Vélez, Danny I. Silva-Conde, Gabriela Yosua Medina-Garcés, Vinicio Mejía-Chávez
